content: I decided I wanted a really nice leather-bound @vm journal and Mathew
Halstead answered the call in style check out this journal he sent me Wow
look at this so cool I love all the details let's take a closer look at this
so we got that neat chain hanging on there with the pin holding it shut we
got this circle with the runes we got a Celtic knot on their damaged
cover you know the slashes in the cover take the pin out you can remove the
strap and let's open this up so nice very thick hard leather but we got this
nice book inside and that what I like is that the book is actually it can come
out of the cover so you can use the cover again it has like bands that hold
the book in right so once I fill it up I can law I can put on my shelf and then
fill this up again these guys logo on the back they're just tons of nice work
in this thank you so much Matthew and just put the pin in there and secure
your notes and so great I just really love this and it's definitely getting
use out of me so I hope you guys enjoyed this and if you do check out his work he
